findings.title: Governance address can change treasury address
findings.description: The governance address has the privilege to modify the treasury address, which could lead to unauthorized access and manipulation of funds.

findings.title: Governance and Guardian addresses can change treasury address
findings.description: The Governance and Guardian addresses have the privilege to modify the treasury address.

findings.title: Governance address can change min value
findings.description: The governance address has the privilege to modify the minimum value, which could lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Governance address can change Governance address
findings.description: The governance address has the privilege to modify its own address, which may lead to unauthorized changes or potential security risks.

findings.title: Governance address can change depositLimit
findings.description: The governance address has the privilege to modify the deposit limit, which could lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Governance address can change performance and management fees
findings.description: The governance address has the ability to modify performance and management fees, which could lead to unauthorized changes to the contract's financial parameters.

findings.title: Governance and Guardian addresses can enable/disable emergencyShutdown
findings.description: The Governance and Guardian addresses have the capability to enable or disable the emergency shutdown functionality.

findings.title: Governance address can add/remove strategy
findings.description: The governance address has the privilege to add or remove strategies.

findings.title: Governance and Guardian addresses can revoke strategies
findings.description: The Governance and Guardian addresses have the capability to revoke strategies.

findings.title: Authorized address can change strategist and keeper addresses
findings.description: The authorized address has the privilege to modify strategist and keeper addresses, which could lead to unauthorized access or manipulation of sensitive contract functionality.

findings.title: Strategist address can change rewards address
findings.description: The strategist address has the privilege to modify the rewards address, which may lead to unauthorized changes and potential security risks.

findings.title: Authorized address can allow emergency exit
findings.description: The authorized address has the capability to enable an emergency exit.

findings.title: Authorized Address Can Change profitFactor, debtThreshold, and maxReportDelay
findings.description: The authorized address has the capability to modify critical parameters such as profitFactor, debtThreshold, and maxReportDelay.

findings.title: Governance address can withdraw ERC20 tokens
findings.description: The governance address has the capability to withdraw ERC20 tokens.

findings.title: Governance and Strategist addresses can enable/disable flashLoanActive
findings.description: The Governance and Strategist addresses have the capability to enable or disable flashLoanActive, which may lead to unauthorized control over the smart contract's functionality.

findings.title: Governance and Strategist addresses can change minXvsToSell and minWant values
findings.description: The Governance and Strategist addresses have the privilege to modify minXvsToSell and minWant values, which could lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Governance and Strategist addresses can change collateralTarget
findings.description: The Governance and Strategist addresses have the capability to modify the collateral target, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Governance address can enable/disable forceMigrate
findings.description: The governance address has the privilege to enable or disable the forceMigrate functionality.

findings.title: Do not forget to adjust secondsPerBlock on target blockchain
findings.description: The audit report notes that it's essential to adjust secondsPerBlock according to the target blockchain.
